data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Cotopaxi.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cotopaxi, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Cotopaxi.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Cotopaxi, Ecuador.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Cotopaxi.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people.
Father, encourage the 43,259 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Cotopaxi, Ecuador, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 43,259 believers in Cotopaxi to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 365,941 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

location.name: Cotopaxi
location.cities_list: Latacunga, La Maná, Pujilí, San Miguel de Salcedo, Saquisilí
location.cities_list_w_pop: Latacunga (51,717), La Maná (16,450), Pujilí (16,168), San Miguel de Salcedo (10,838), Saquisilí (3,778)
